gobblin.config.common.impl

Interface ConfigStoreTopologyInspector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigStoreBackedTopology, InMemoryTopology

    public interface ConfigStoreTopologyInspector
    The ConfigStoreTopology interface used to describe the topology of a configuration store. Each node in the configuration store is represented as one ConfigKeyPath, so the topology of any node includes: 1. The link to it's parent ( already defined in ConfigKeyPath ) 2. All the direct children of the node. 3. The node's directly outgoing imports links. ( defined as getOwnImports() ) 4. Other nodes which directly imports the node. ( defined as getImportedBy() ) 5. The node's directly and indirectly imports links. ( defined as getImportsRecursively ) 6. Other nodes which directly and indirectly imports the node. ( defined as getImportedByRecursively() )

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<ConfigKeyPath> getChildren(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
      Obtains the direct children config keys for a given config key.
      Collection<ConfigKeyPath> getImportedBy(ConfigKeyPath configKey)

      Collection<ConfigKeyPath> getImportedByRecursively(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
      Obtains all config keys which directly or indirectly import a given config key
      List<ConfigKeyPath> getImportsRecursively(ConfigKeyPath configKey)

    • Method Detail

      • getChildren

        Collection<ConfigKeyPath> getChildren(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
        Obtains the direct children config keys for a given config key.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the config key path whose children are necessary.
        Returns:
        the direct children config key paths

      • getOwnImports

        List<ConfigKeyPath> getOwnImports(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
        Parameters:
        configKey - the config key path which to get own imports.
        Returns:
        the paths of the directly imported config keys for the specified config key Note that order is significant the earlier ConfigKeyPath in the List will have higher priority when resolving configuration conflicts.

      • getImportedBy

        Collection<ConfigKeyPath> getImportedBy(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
        Obtains the collection of config keys which import a given config key.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the config key path which is imported
        Returns:
        The Collection of paths of the config keys which import the specified config key

      • getImportsRecursively

        List<ConfigKeyPath> getImportsRecursively(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
        Obtains the list of config keys which are directly and indirectly imported by the specified config key. The import graph is traversed in depth-first manner. For a given config key, explicit imports are listed before implicit imports from the ancestor keys.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the path of the config key whose imports are needed
        Returns:
        the paths of the directly and indirectly imported keys, including config keys imported by ancestors. The earlier config key in the list will have higher priority when resolving configuration conflict.

      • getImportedByRecursively

        Collection<ConfigKeyPath> getImportedByRecursively(ConfigKeyPath configKey)
        Obtains all config keys which directly or indirectly import a given config key
        Parameters:
        configKey - the path of the config key being imported
        Returns:
        The Collection of paths of the config keys that directly or indirectly import the specified config key in the specified conf version.
